      • onEntityCollided

        public static void onEntityCollided(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                    net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos blockPos,
                                    net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity)
        This should by called when custom entities collide. It will call the correct method in Block.onEntityWalk(World, BlockPos, Entity).
        Parameters:
        world - The world
        blockPos - The position.
        entity - The entity that collides.

        blockPos - The position.

                                                                          double x,

                                                                          double z)

        Parameters:
        world - The world.
        entityName - The name of the entity.
        x - X coordinate.

        z - Z coordinate.
